participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.background: I have a large cd collection. I like vintage furniture. I collect stamps. Favorite band is the Beatles. I play the bass.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Outgoing, energetic, and loves being active.
participant_2.background: I really like to go to school. I am six feet tall. I love to run. I like to dance with my friends. I have a family that are all tall.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to school and dance with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What kind of music do you like to dance to?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially like to dance to pop and hip-hop.
Me too! I love to dance to pop music. What's your favorite pop song right now?
I love the new Taylor Swift song, "Shake It Off." It's so catchy and fun to dance to.
I love that song too! I'm always singing it when I'm in the car. What other hobbies do you have?
I also like to collect stamps and play the bass guitar.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn to play the guitar, but I've never had the time.
It's not too hard to learn. I taught myself how to play.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Do you have any other hobbies besides music?
I like to collect vintage furniture and go antique shopping.
That's cool! I love going antique shopping too. I've found some really great pieces of furniture that way.
Me too! I love finding unique pieces that I can't find anywhere else.
It's so fun to find something that you know is special and that no one else has.
I know, right? It's like you're finding a little piece of history.
